nodes.bodyText: This wasn't private before but should be now problem to do so as there is a setter anyway
Had to add a setter here, since we are now no longer testing this in the same package, do you think thats ok?
I'm happy about every test we can remove here, see #1986.
This was Bug2: For GET a missing gpx.millis would give null, but for POST it would be an empty String.
Not handling NumberFormatException gave a misleading error message.
We could also remove maxunzipped length here since we are not testing it anyway, but we might need it for some other tests in GraphHopperWebIT (but then we can still add it -> removed it here :))
Yes, this would be probably a good idea.
